greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle related to powers of 3 partitions of n.
comment: Row sums are A117943. Inverse is A117945. Row sums of inverse are A039966. A117944=A117939 mod 2 and A117944=A117939^(-1) mod 2.
formula: Triangle T(n,k)=sum{j=0..n, L(C(n,j)/3)*L(C(n-j,k)/3)} mod 2, where L(j/p) is the Legendre symbol of j and p.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Apr 05 2006
